plot: Funny story about two families and their growing children. Their are friends and have the same problems with youth - their problems in school, with boys and girls. Youth have problems too, but with with parents.
plot_en: Funny story about two families and their growing children. Their are friends and have the same problems with youth - their problems in school, with boys and girls. Youth have problems too, but with with parents.

title: Wojna domowa
